subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon was downright embarrassed after making a mistake last Sunday that cost him an almost certain victory and 10 more bonus points heading into the coming Nascar Chase for the Nextel Cup.
snippet: Jeff Gordon was downright embarrassed after making a mistake last Sunday that cost him an almost certain victory and 10 more bonus points heading into the coming Nascar Chase for the Nextel Cup.
